thread.title: Guernsey States to look at help for first time buyers
thread.title_full: Guernsey States to look at help for first time buyers | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Guernsey States to look at help for first time buyers
text:
Credit: Chris Ison / PA Wire/Press Association Images Guernsey's States is going to look into providing money for a partial ownership fund for first time buyers.
They've authorised a report investigating any scheme which should come before politicians next summer.
A new fund for first time buyers would work with Guernsey Housing Association's partial ownership scheme.
States members have raised concerns that the report won't be completed by the July 2016 deadline, with many saying that it was more likely to be presented to the House in early 2017.
The Treasury and Resources and Housing Departments both opposed the amendment, which was brought by Deputies Heidi Soulsby and Michelle Le Clerc.
Last updated Wed 30 Sep 2015 Politics Guernsey
